Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package prometheus-adapter for versions less than 0.10.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package prometheus-adapter for versions less than 0.10.0-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package prometheus-adapter is earlier than 0.10.0-2, affected by CVE-2023-44487
